entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 10.

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
